pr_title: Modify JPA HybridPersistenceActivator to not key off ClassLoader.

timeline.bodyText: WeakHashMap is not thread safe.  Nothing is done to give you thread safety when accessing the map.  This can lead to infinite loops.
timeline.author: jhanders34

replies.bodyText: Protected map access with a sync block.
replies.author: jgrassel

replies.bodyText: Yeah it is going to need some work still.  You are going to have to do like the previous code to do the put after you populate the List.  If you don't you can erroneously return an empty or partial list in another thread.
replies.author: jhanders34
